description: Extensions to HtmlHelper for things like checkbox lists, adds support for most to HTML5 input types and provides a fluent strongly-type way of specifying attributes.
releaseNotes:
**!!!POSSIBLE BREAKING CHANGE!!!**
* Changed how a list of checkboxes are created.  Instead of overloads to the CheckBoxFor method, there are new methods on the HtmlHelper called CheckBoxListItem and CheckBoxListItemFor. If you are currently using Version 2.2.0, this will cause a breaking change.

Enhancements:
* Added overloads to CheckBox and CheckBoxFor to create a checkbox with values for checked and unchecked other than the default true/false.
* Added better support for creating a list of checkboxes by using the methods CheckBoxListItem and CheckBoxListItemFor.
* Added methods Description and DescriptionFor to retrieve the description value specified in the view model with the DataAnnotation attributes.
* Added support for removing a class that you previously specified in your attribute expression.
summary: Extensions to HtmlHelper for things like checkbox lists, adds support for most to HTML5 input types and provides a fluent strongly-type way of specifying attributes.
title: Hex
